column4: hi guys..i remember a while ago i saw an applet/prog that changed the taskbar into "icons" ala win7..cant find it now..anyone knows anything 'bout that?
nah IndyGunFreak  and joaopinto i mean a taskbar with icons instead of long boxes with app names..like win7 and tint2 (in crucnhbang)
only thing i'm aware of, even remotely like that, is avant window manager.
